statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ -12 \\ -12 \\ -11 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ 42 \\ 42 \\ 37 \\ 9 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
